TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A type of oil that is made from petroleum (mixture of oily liquids found in the earth). Mineral oil is used in laxatives, lubricants, creams, and lotions.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "aceite de vaselina"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Tipo de aceite derivado del petróleo (mezcla de líquidos grasos que se encuentran en la tierra). El aceite de vaselina se usa en laxantes, lubricantes, cremas y lociones.
